meanings.sent1: His impotencies in math made it challenging for him to solve the problem.
meanings.sent2: The impotencies of the old machine led to frequent breakdowns.
meanings.sent3: The cat's impotencies in catching the mouse provided endless entertainment for the family.
meanings.sent4: The impotencies of the leaky roof allowed rain to seep into the house.
meanings.sent5: The student's impotencies in remembering facts made studying difficult.

meanings.sent1: The impotencies of the broken flashlight left them in the dark.
meanings.sent2: She felt frustrated by the impotencies of her arguments during the debate.
meanings.sent3: The comedian joked about the impotencies of his plant-growing skills.
meanings.sent4: The impotencies of the worn-out shoes made walking uncomfortable.
meanings.sent5: The team's impotencies in scoring goals cost them the championship.
